channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-6680] Decimal128#update(Decimal128 o, short scale) should adjust the unscaled value.
item.description: Decimal128#update(Decimal128 o, short scale) should adjust the unscaled value.
item.summary: Decimal128#update(Decimal128 o, short scale) should adjust the unscaled value.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
